reference.title: songCollection

example.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE songCollection PUBLIC "-//RDA//DTD DITA Song Reference//EN" "../../dtd/songCollection.dtd"> <songCollection id="a7743"> <title>Väsen</title> <songBody> <songList> <songRow> <song>Kapten Kapsyl</song> <album>Whirled</album> <artist>Väsen</artist> <genre>Folk</genre> <rating>5</rating> <count>46</count> <playdate>2010-02-14</playdate> </songrow> <songRow> <song>Today's the Day</song> <album>Love is Why</album> <artist>Shake Russell</artist> <genre>Country</genre> <rating>5</rating> <count>34</count> <playdate>2010-01-30</playdate> </songrow> <songRow> <song>Jesus on the Mainline</song> <album>Jubilee</album> <artist>Charlie Parr</artist> <genre>Folk</genre> <rating>5</rating> <count>28</count> <playdate>2010-03-04</playdate> </songrow> <songRow> <song>Jamie Across the Water</song> <album>Alloy</album> <artist>Boiled in Lead</artist> <genre>Alloy</genre> <rating>5</rating> <count>31</count> <playdate>2010-02-16</playdate> </songrow> </songList> </songBody> </songCollection>
